alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 7:30PM EDT until March 16 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN COLUMBIA...SOUTHWESTERN EDGEFIELD AND SOUTHEASTERN MCCORMICK COUNTIES... At 729 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Martinez, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters just north of Augusta reported quarter sized hail. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... North Augusta, Evans, Martinez, Edgefield, Clarks Hill Recreation Area, J. Strom Thurmond Dam, Poverty Hill, Scott`s Landing, Savannah Rapids Park, Colliers, River Island, Edgefield Federal Correction Institution, Lick Fork Campground, Westport, Riverside Park, Stevens Creek Public Park, Murphys Estates, Lost Wilderness Fire Station, Ninety Nine Islands and Mt Vintage. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
